Flowers

Welcome!

Dandelion

A herbaceous perennial flowering plant in the daisy family, Asteraceae. The common dandelion is well-known for its yellow flower heads that turn into round balls of many silver-tufted fruit, which disperse in the wind.

Lilac

A species of flowering plant in the olive family, Oleaceae. It is widely cultivated for its scented flowers in Europe (particularly the north and west) and North America.
